remarks: Less-than or equal property of a lattice automorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 19-May-2012.)
statement:
lautset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lautset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lautset.i $e |- I = ( LAut ` K ) $.
lautle $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ F e. I ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> ( F ` X ) .<_ ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
